gui

Class MainMenuGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.MainMenuGUI

  • public class MainMenuGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The GUI of the game starts at the main menu where the players are prompted to set the settings of the game. They also have the option to load a game from a save file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      javafx.scene.layout.GridPane root 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainMenuGUI()
      The constructor creates the layout of the display of the main menu screen.

    • Field Detail

      • root

        public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane root

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainMenuGUI

        public MainMenuGUI()
        The constructor creates the layout of the display of the main menu screen. the layout consists of a grid pane with 5 rows and one column Each row contains a setting, a start button on the 4th row, and a load button at the 5th row.

    • Method Detail

      • getMenuRoot

        public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane getMenuRoot()
        gets the GridPane layout of the main menu
        Returns:
        root a GridPane instance of the main menu layout

      • sectionTitle

        public javafx.scene.control.Label sectionTitle(java.lang.String section)
        creates a label of the section title of a specific setting
        Parameters:
        section - - sets the text to the string section
        Returns:
        modeTitle - a Label instance of the title of a specific setting

      • modeSection

        public javafx.scene.layout.VBox modeSection()
        The section of the game mode settings in the GridPane layout of the main menu. This section has two parts. The section Title at the top, and at the bottom, the left and right buttons with the changing values in between.
        Returns:
        modeVSection a VBox layout which represents the Game mode settings in the menu screen.

      • boardSizeSection

        public javafx.scene.layout.VBox boardSizeSection()
        The section of the board size settings in the GridPane layout of the main menu. The section Title at the top, and at the bottom, the left and right buttons with the changing values in between.
        Returns:
        boardVSection a VBox layout which represents the Board size settings in the menu screen.
